mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN status = '대기' THEN 1 END) AS waitingCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = '결재중' THEN 1 END) AS processingCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = '완료' THEN 1 END) AS completedCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = '반송' THEN 1 END) AS returnedCount FROM CLAIM WHERE DATE(receipt_date) = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN amount <= 1000000 THEN 1 END) AS countUnder1M, COUNT(CASE WHEN amount > 1000000 THEN 1 END) AS countOver1M FROM CLAIM_RESULT

/* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.dashboard.selectMonthlyPerformance */
SELECT -- 이번 달에 처리된 건수 총합 CONCAT(COUNT(*), '건') AS totalProcessedCount, -- 처리일(cr.date)과 접수일(c.receipt_date)의 날짜 차이(일)를 계산하여 평균을 구하고, '일'을 붙임 CONCAT(ROUND(AVG(DATEDIFF(cr.date, c.receipt_date)), 1), '일') AS avgProcessingTime FROM CLAIM_RESULT cr JOIN CLAIM c ON cr.claim_no = c.claim_no WHERE -- 처리일(cr.date)이 이번 달에 해당하는 데이터만 필터링 YEAR(cr.date) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(cr.date) = MONTH(CURDATE())

/* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.dashboard.selectSupplementStatus */
SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN completed_date IS NULL THEN 1 END) AS requestCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN completed_date IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) AS completedCount, CONCAT(IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, request_date, completed_date)) / 60, 1), 0), '시간') AS avgProcessingTime FROM ADDITIONAL_REQ
/* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.dashboard.selectYesterdayProcessedCount */ SELECT CONCAT(COUNT(*), '건') AS yesterdayProcessedCount FROM CLAIM_RESULT WHERE date = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY

/* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.dashboard.selectPaymentRate */
SELECT -- (지급액 합계 / 청구액 합계) * 100, 소수점 1자리까지 반올림 후 '%' 기호 붙이기 CONCAT( ROUND( -- 분모(SUM(s.final_due))가 0일 경우 에러 방지 IFNULL(SUM(s.refund_amt) / NULLIF(SUM(s.final_due), 0) * 100, 0) , 1) , '%') AS approvalRate FROM SETTLEMENT s JOIN CLAIM_RESULT cr ON s.claim_no = cr.claim_no WHERE -- 처리일(cr.date)이 이번 달에 해당하는 데이터만 필터링 YEAR(cr.date) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(cr.date) = MONTH(CURDATE())

/* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.dashboard.selectUrgentClaims (단순화) */
WITH RECURSIVE BusinessDays AS ( SELECT c.claim_no, c.receipt_date, c.receipt_date AS next_day, 0 AS business_day_count FROM CLAIM c WHERE c.status NOT IN ('완료', '반송') UNION ALL SELECT b.claim_no, b.receipt_date, DATE_ADD(b.next_day, INTERVAL 1 DAY), b.business_day_count + CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(DATE_ADD(b.next_day, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) IN (1, 7) THEN 0 WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TBL_HOLIDAYS h WHERE h.holiday_date = DATE(DATE_ADD(b.next_day, INTERVAL 1 DAY))) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM BusinessDays b WHERE b.business_day_count < 3 ), Deadlines AS ( SELECT claim_no, MIN(next_day) AS deadline_date FROM BusinessDays WHERE business_day_count = 3 GROUP BY claim_no ) SELECT d.claim_no AS claimNo, IFNULL(u.user_name, '-') AS userName, c.claim_content AS claimContent, c.claim_type AS claimType, IFNULL(e.emp_name, '미배정') AS empName, c.status AS status, CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), d.deadline_date) <= 0 THEN IF(ABS(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), d.deadline_date)) >= 60, CONCAT(ABS(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, NOW(), d.deadline_date)), '시간 초과'), CONCAT(ABS(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), d.deadline_date)), '분 초과') ) ELSE IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), d.deadline_date) < 60, CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), d.deadline_date), '분 남음'), CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, NOW(), d.deadline_date), '시간 남음') ) END AS deadline, 'high' AS timeRemaining FROM Deadlines d LEFT JOIN CLAIM c ON d.claim_no = c.claim_no LEFT JOIN USER u ON c.ID = u.ID LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON c.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE d.deadline_date <= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR) ORDER BY d.deadline_date ASC

/* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.dashboard.selectWeeklyTrend (배치 통계 테이블 조회 - 7 영업일) */
WITH RECURSIVE DateRange AS ( -- 어제부터 14일간의 날짜를 생성 SELECT CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AS Date UNION ALL SELECT Date - INTERVAL 1 DAY FROM DateRange WHERE Date > CURDATE() - INTERVAL 14 DAY ), BusinessDays AS ( -- 생성된 날짜에서 주말과 공휴일을 제외하고 최신 7일만 선택 SELECT Date FROM DateRange WHERE DAYOFWEEK(Date) NOT IN (1, 7) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TBL_HOLIDAYS h WHERE h.holiday_date = Date) ORDER BY Date DESC LIMIT 7 ) -- 위에서 구한 7 영업일을 기준으로 통계 테이블을 조회 SELECT DATE_FORMAT(b.Date, '%m/%d') AS reportDate, IFNULL(d.APPROVAL_COUNT, 0) AS approvalCount, IFNULL(d.SIMPLEPAY_COUNT, 0) AS simplePayCount FROM BusinessDays b LEFT JOIN DASHBOARD_WEEKLY_TREND d ON b.Date = d.STAT_DATE ORDER BY b.Date ASC;
/* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.dashboard.selectClaimTypeDistribution (청구 유형별 분포) */ SELECT LABEL AS label, VALUE AS value FROM DASHBOARD_CLAIM_TYPE ORDER BY VALUE DESC;

/* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.dashboard.selectMonthlyApprovalRate (배치 통계 테이블 조회) */
SELECT CONCAT(STAT_MONTH, '월') AS label, APPROVAL_RATE AS value FROM DASHBOARD_MONTHLY_RATE WHERE STAT_YEAR = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND STAT_MONTH < MONTH(CURDATE()) -- 이번 달 제외하고 지난달까지 ORDER BY STAT_MONTH ASC LIMIT 6 -- 최근 6개월

/* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.dashboard.selectProcessingTimeTrend (배치 통계 테이블 조회) */
WITH RECURSIVE DateRange AS ( SELECT CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AS `Date` UNION ALL SELECT `Date` - INTERVAL 1 DAY FROM DateRange WHERE `Date` > CURDATE() - INTERVAL 14 DAY ), BusinessDays AS ( SELECT `Date` FROM DateRange WHERE DAYOFWEEK(`Date`) NOT IN (1, 7) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TBL_HOLIDAYS h WHERE h.holiday_date = `Date`) LIMIT 7 ) SELECT DATE_FORMAT(b.Date, '%m/%d') AS label, IFNULL(d.AVG_PROCESSING_TIME, 0) AS value FROM BusinessDays b LEFT JOIN DASHBOARD_DAILY_TIME d ON b.Date = d.STAT_DATE ORDER BY b.Date ASC

/* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.dashboard.selectProcessingTimeOutlierCount (배치 통계 테이블 조회) */
WITH RECURSIVE DateRange AS ( SELECT CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AS `Date` UNION ALL SELECT `Date` - INTERVAL 1 DAY FROM DateRange WHERE `Date` > CURDATE() - INTERVAL 14 DAY ), BusinessDays AS ( SELECT `Date` FROM DateRange WHERE DAYOFWEEK(`Date`) NOT IN (1, 7) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TBL_HOLIDAYS h WHERE h.holiday_date = `Date`) LIMIT 7 ) SELECT IFNULL(SUM(d.OUTLIER_COUNT), 0) FROM BusinessDays b LEFT JOIN DASHBOARD_DAILY_TIME d ON b.Date = d.STAT_DATE
